zerodha nifty largemidcap.investment_objective: The investment objective of the scheme is to invest in stocks comprising the Nifty LargeMidcap 250 Index in the same proportion as in the index to achieve returns equivalent to the Total Return Index of Nifty LargeMidcap 250 Index (subject to tracking error).

zerodha elss tax saver nifty.investment_objective: The investment objective of the scheme is to invest in stocks comprising the Nifty LargeMidcap 250 Index in the same proportion as in the index to achieve returns equivalent to the Total Return Index of Nifty LargeMidcap 250 Index (subject to tracking error), while offering deduction on such investment made in the scheme under Section 80C of the Income-tax Act, 1961.

scheme_details.min_investment: (at exchange) 1 Unit Min. Investment (direct with AMC) In Creation Unit Size Expense Ratio 0.27% Exit Load 0% Benchmark Nifty 1D Rate Index

zerodha nifty 1d rate.investment_objective: The investment objective of the Scheme is to invest in Tri Party repo on Government securities or treasury bills (TREPS). The Scheme aims to provide investment returns that, before expenses, correspond to the returns of the NIFTY 1D Rate Index, subject to tracking error. Simple annualized returns have been provided as per the existing guidelines since the scheme has completed more than 6 months but less than 1 year.

zerodha gold etf.investment_objective: The investment objective of the scheme is to generate returns corresponding to the Domestic Price of Physical Gold before expenses, subject to tracking errors, fees and expenses by investing in Physical Gold. Simple annualized returns have been provided as per the existing guidelines since the scheme has completed more than 6 months but less than 1 year.
